name: stories-web
description: If you have a number of files that you'd like to add to IPFS and end up with a hash representing the directory containing your files, you can invoke [`ipfs.add`](https://github.com/ipfs/interface-ipfs-core/blob/master/SPEC/FILES.md#add) with an array of objects.
author: Vladimir Grichina <vgrichina@gmail.com>
